media_type.name: PagerDuty
media_type.description:
Please refer to https://v2.developer.pagerduty.com/docs/send-an-event-events-api-v2 and https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/5.0/manual/config/notifications/media/webhook#example_scripts.
Set global macro {$ZABBIX.URL} with your Zabbix server URL. Add a dedicated user with the media type "PagerDuty" and place the integration key in the "token" parameter to integrate into the service.
